Content: Hey Guys I have a 1980 Honda CB 900 custom its has been sitting about 5 years it need carbs going through brakes the normal stuff this isn't my fist rodeo with a bike that has been sitting for a while but this one is making a noise on the left side of the engine it stop off of idle I don't think its a rod I know these bikes have countershaft on the left side I've never fool with one of these before so if anybody knows how to diagnosed this noise I would greatly appreciate any help I can send a video as soon as I figure out how I will have to wait until one of my grandkids come up here to show me how if you need more information just tell me what you need any and all help will be greatly appreciated have a great day and God bless
